entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
